title: Rules
text: • The borders of the field may not be trespassed. Players may only move within those borders.
• If one team throws the ball out of bounds, the opponent gets ahold of the ball. Same if the player in possession of the ball steps out of bounds.
• When the ball lands in the catcherâ€˜s basket, it is valued one point.
• A basket is only counted if the ball does not bounce out of the basket.
• After one team reaches six points, the field sides will be chanced.
• For winning the game, one team has to score 12 points while being at least 2 points ahead of the opponent.
